description: This file serves as the entry point for the production build of a Qwik application during the Vite preview process. It imports the necessary modules, including QwikCity middleware, the server-side rendering plan, and the application's render function, then creates and exports a QwikCity server handler.

methods.name: createQwikCity
methods.description: Creates a QwikCity server handler with the provided configuration, including the application's render function and plan.
